rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Lately I've been tearing myself apart
wondering what my wife's last
moments were like.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0002
rows.name:
For the longest time I couldn't bring
myself to ask Kai, but he told me in
the end. What a brave kid.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0003
rows.name:
She was killed protecting our children.
She lied to them and said everything
would be OK, then helped them escape.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Kei doesn't remember what
happened that day. She still thinks
Nelly escaped, too.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sure her little mind's convinced her
that Nelly's still alive. Otherwise her
heart would fall apart.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0006
rows.name:
I know that it's my duty as a father
to tell Kei the truth, but...

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't stand the thought of hurting her.
I want to preserve Nelly's lie a little bit
longer.

rows.label: tlk70000048_02_msg0008
rows.name: What a bad father I am...
